column1: # Emission temporal profiles for month in year

# 2018-10-12, Antoon Visschedijk, Temporal profiles converted from SNAP-based to GNFR-based, new temporal profiles for K_AgriLivestock and L_AgriOther based on Skjøth, C. A., Geels, C., Berge, H., Gyldenkærne, S., Fagerli, H., Ellermann, T., ... & Hertel, O. (2011). Spatial and temporal variations in ammonia emissions–a freely accessible model code for Europe. Atmospheric Chemistry and Physics, 11(11), 5221-5236.
